nodes.text: The Minimech CE was a droid active during the Cold War.

The Minimech CE is available to players who bought the Collector's Edition of Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role playing game (MMORPG) from BioWare. Like all Collector's Edition items, it arrives in the in-game mail and can't be sold or traded. The Minimech mouse droid serves as a pet, an object intended for companionship or amusement only. In-game text denotes that the droid is an early MSE-series droid, and promotional material labeled it only as a Mouse Droid.
